xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/118281-Annika Bengtzon: Crime Reporter - Prime Time 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zohaTLTrQoN1oeMm2jr6VS6YEgJ.jpg It is Midsummer's Eve and ten people are on a deserted castle for a TV recording. The next morning the program leader is shot dead. Kvällspressens Annika Bengtzon a mandate to monitor the murder, but she soon learns that her best friend Anne Snapphanevägen is one of the ten suspects. When the police released all one after another - all except Anne - it becomes personal for Bengtzon who will do anything to exonerate her friend. Annika Bengtzon: Crime Reporter - Prime Time
